  • Method Details

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn. Here, we do some checking of Abilities of the Player has and depends on the conditions, some actions will be added and some will be removed.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - Collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn
      map - The map containing the Actor
      display - The I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      Action to perform on the current turn
